title: [Gameplay] Mecha Aatrox sounds
body: When using Aatrox's Q in the Mecha skin there's no sound when he lands like there's supposed to be. Classic is fine but I don't have the other skin so I don't know if it works there. It's happened the last two times I've played Mecha Aatrox, everytime I use his Q.

replies.body:
Thank you for the report.
This issue should be fixed in the upcoming patch!
